metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Blushing MermaidOne of traders - NOTE Please rename to Cinna Brewcellar.

0.speaker: Cinna Brewcellar
0.text: Never liked those big Watchers, but with them gone, who's going to protect us traders from street thugs? The Fists? Fah!

1.speaker: Cinna Brewcellar
1.text: If we don't deliver this Baalor Ale to the Blushing Mermaid, the folk there are going to get ugly. Well, uglier.
